law.catch_line: Expenses of preparing journals -- How paid.
law.text: The expenses of preparing, indexing, and editing the journals of the General Assembly shall be paid from the appropriation for legislative journals and acts upon requisition of the co-chairmen of the Legislative Research Commission.
law.history: Amended 1984 Ky. Acts ch. 111, sec. 4, effective July 13, 1984. -- Created 1956 Ky. Acts ch. 1, sec. 3.
